properties.areaDesc: Jones, GA; Twiggs, GA; Monroe, GA; Bibb, GA; Houston, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 4:45AM EST until January 18 at 8:42PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding
Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Chattahoochee River near Columbus affecting Lee...Russell...
Chattahoochee and Muscogee Counties

Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Crawford...
Talbot...Taylor and Upson Counties

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Washington and Wilkinson
Counties

Oconee River near Oconee affecting Johnson...Washington and
Wilkinson Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Ocmulgee River near Macon.
* Until Saturday evening.
* At 3 AM Thursday the stage was 22.9 feet...and
falling.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Flood stage is 18 feet.
* At 23 feet...Minor flooding continues to expand. Large portions
of the Macon GreenWay Ocmulgee Heritage Trail floods north of the
Martin Luther King Boulevard bridge. The flood waters will be up to
3 feet deep on portions of the trail. Large portions of
agricultural lands east of Macon and well downstream will be under
1 to 5 feet of water.
* This crest compares to a previous crest of 23.7 feet on Jan 5 2019.
